RyuujinTypes.Name: Midori-ryuu, the Green Dragon
Benedictions: The Tale of the Traveler's Journal

Artefacts.Name: Encyclopedia
Artefacts.Description: You are running the game with rules as written.

Artefacts.Name: Sextant
Artefacts.Description: This artefact indicates the GM has created a few original rules and will be using them.

Artefacts.Name: Torch
Artefacts.Description: At the end of each session, all of the experience granted by PCs is doubled.

Artefacts.Name: Crystal
Artefacts.Description: All of the PCs can survive damage that reduces them as far as -20 HP. They will not die until their HP reaches -21.

Benedictions.Name: The Tale of the Journey
Benedictions.Description: Up to two PCs who roleplay ardently pursuing the goal of the journey can ignore all weather modifiers for the rest of the session.

Benedictions.Name: The Tale of Nostalgia
Benedictions.Description: If the PCs roleplay having nostalgia for home, they can ignore all negative effects of mind-based status effects for the rest of the session; this affects up to two PCs at once if they meet the conditions.

Benedictions.Name: The Tale of the Traveler's Journal
Benedictions.Description: At the end of the session, up to two PCs who write about their journey in a travel diary will receive their character level x 300 in gold.
